pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package contains the mscgen_ Sphinx_ extension... _mscgen: http://www.mcternan.me.uk/mscgen/.. _Sphinx: http://sphinx.pocoo.org/Allow mscgen-formatted Message Sequence Chart (MSC) graphs to be included inSphinx-generated documents inline. For example:: .. msc:: hscale = "0.5"; a,b,c; a->b [ label = "ab()" ] ; b->c [ label = "bc(TRUE)"]; c=>c [ label = "process()" ];
